divs: Sighting DetailsWe were so far up in the mountains and we were lost during a snow storm, looking for a friends house that my wife was at because she became snow in and you couldn't drive down the road that my f,fiend lived so we parked out on the main road and started walking down every road looking for the house, or a house with lights on and we came to a dead end with snow piled high at the end, that when we seen the three triangle lights hovering I got a sense that seen us, cues we were crouched behind the snow bank, and it moved towards us in a way that if you blinked it was 50 ft closer that's when I decided to stand up and walk away and gave my friend my pocket knife and opened it and told him not to look back until we were out sight and around the corner and started to run the brightness of this light was like construction lights like they use to work on the roads at night but we were so far up in the mountains and on a snow cover diirt road on a night that was a blizzard there absolutely was no road construction going at that time of night I got a sense that they seen us I could here them in my mind it felt like,that's what scared me and made run
Summary: Three triangles hovering 5 ft above the ground we walked up on it my accident I got a sense that it seen us it moved towards in a way that when you blinked it was cooler every time that's what freighted us.when turned and walked away slowly wi
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Dunsmuir
There were no other sightings in Dunsmuir on or around February 20th 1990
